description: Try our easy to follow Prawn With Parmesan Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn With Parmesan Cream Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 scallions, white and green parts, sliced
3 tbs Parmesan cheese, freshly shredded (to garnish)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add the pancetta and cook for 5 minutes until beginning to brown. Add the scallions and garlic, and cook 3 minutes more, or until the scallions are just beginning to soften.

Add the prawn and cook, stirring occasionally, for about 3 minutes, until they are almost completely opaque. Add the crème fraîche and bring just to a simmer. Stir in the lemon juice and season to taste with salt and pepper. Lower the heat and simmer until the prawn are opaque throughout, about 1 minute.
Transfer to a serving dish. Sprinkle with the Parmesan and garnish with spinach. Serve hot.
